text: @realDonaldTrump @Varneyco Speaking of pizza: Herman Cain just died of the coronavirus. He had once been CEO of Godfather's Pizza. Cain wouldn't wear a mask either but he did not get to have everyone tested around him, as you do to protect yourself. You manically give false idea that masks are unnecessary.
